channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache OpenMeetings

item.title: CVE-2023-28326|2023-03-28T12:36:11.566Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20openmeetings
item.description:
Vendor: The Apache Software Foundation
Versions Affected: Apache OpenMeetings from 2.0.0 before 7.0.0
Description: Attacker can elevate their privileges in any room

item.title: CVE-2023-28936|2023-05-12T07:45:04.835Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20openmeetings
item.description:
Attacker can access arbitrary recording/room

item.title: CVE-2023-29032|2023-05-12T07:43:30.483Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20openmeetings
item.description:
An attacker that has gained access to certain private information can use this to act as other user.
Vendor: The Apache Software Foundation
Versions Affected: Apache OpenMeetings from 3.1.3 before 7.1.0

item.title: CVE-2023-29246|2023-05-12T07:43:20.422Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20openmeetings
item.description:
An attacker who has gained access to an admin account can perform RCE via null-byte injection
Vendor: The Apache Software Foundation
Versions Affected: Apache OpenMeetings from 2.0.0 before 7.1.0
